name: sunrise-theme-web
description: Home of the Sunrise theme for Visual Studio Code
author: Seingshin Lee <seingshinlee@gmail.com>

scripts.prescript: yarn global add parcel-bundler && yarn install && del --force ./colors.json && nwget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sunrise-theme/sunrise-theme-vscode/beta/assets/json/dark/colors.json -O ./colors.json
